Title: A New Multichannel Broadband Near Infrared Spectroscopy System to Measure the Spatial Distribution of Cytochrome-c-Oxidase and Tissue Oxygenation
Abstract: © OSA 2016.We report a novel broadband near-infrared spectroscopy system that has the capability of measuring changes in cerebral haemodynamics and metabolism at multiple locations simultaneously.
